ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hi all
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahh seeing your question makes me happy, let me explain. I posed a question about a guild earlier in the week and you remark about taking someone that low
ygData.messageBody:
Ahh seeing your question makes me happy, let me
explain.

I posed a question about a guild earlier in the week
and you remark about taking someone that low seems to
boost my confidence in the guild I just started.

My highest char is 20 and I started a guild for which
I will recruit First Timer and non twinks under the
level of 10. Reason I figure is newbs always have
questions, looking for players/friends, what have you
and most guilds want High level chars.

I formed my Guild to bring newbs into the game to meet
people and grow their chars together. This way
everyone will know the trubulations of making a char
and the time that goes into it.

I had my doubts but with you question, I think it will
have a good response.

it just got approved and created last night, tonight
is recruit night....lol

Well, this just me ranting, hopefully the guild
succeeds.

Thanks for listening.....

Rob
--- The Mad Macinchaote <scendera@...> wrote:
> I'll be by sometime...I've got a 15 Ikky shaman
> who's looking to be quite fun on TP. You know of any
> guilds who'd take someone that low?
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: nadenu1
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Wednesday, June 12, 2002 10:04 AM
> Subject: [EverQuest] Hi all
>
>
> I've been reading the posts for a while and
> thought I'd say hello. I
> play on the Tholuxe Paells server. My main is a 44
> druid and I've got
> quite a few little alts too. If anyone is on TP,
> look me up. :)
>
> Nadenu Willowmist
